title: Terrorists Being Allowed Into The USA? (Ep 1803)
description:
Terrorists being allowed in the United States? Is Biden the worst politician in modern US history? In this episode, I address the latest on these stories. 

News Picks:


Lowest confidence in presidency ever recorded. Biden is a disaster.


The NY Times is all in on censorship.

Politico doing its best to make sure conservatives can’t find lawyers.


Gavin Newsom is an enormous fraud.


Companies could face hurdles covering abortion travel costs.

Biden to allow some migrants with terrorist ties into the country, raising security concerns.

'Queer-owned' leftist cafe in Philadelphia gets shut down by woke employees for not being left-wing enough.
